name: Coco Spaceonaut
description:
Changes made by Armando Marques da S Sobrinho

Level 1:

  • Modified the acid tank;
  • Changed the disposition of some items;
  • Added some trophies, lives and etc;

Level 2:

  • Changed the key position for the victory door;
  • Created a static platform with an enemy
  • Created a moving platform for the horizontal
  • created more freebies and checkpoints

Level 3:

  • Completely modified the layout
  • Increased playing area;
  • Positioned 3 more doors;
  • Positioned several acid tanks
  • Placed multiple enemies on the scene
  • Changed the color of some of the enemies
  • Changed survivability for some of the enemies
  • positioned bone animated as a damage area

Main Menu:

  • Created a help screen

All Levels:

  • Created a animated bone tilemap;

Created a Linux version
